name: Tank Battalion
overview: Blue tanks representing the enemy press in on your position, shaking the earth as they come. You as lone defender must check their offensive, and the action soon turns from intense street fighting to a heroic battle to the death! The drama builds as you're forced to make difficult strategic decisions - score big points through close-range combat, or lay back and pick them off as they come. A game of combat demanding courage, skill and a resolute will to survive Tank Battalion!
